title: N172 Old Judge Harry Stovey SGC 10 for sale or trade

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge Harry Stovey SGC 10 for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave M
I purchased this Stovey for a friend of mine that decided he didn't want it afterwards.  It is listed on eBay right now but am looking for offers to buy or trade for T206's that I need.  If you would like to send any offers, please do so to t206wagner@yahoo.com.  Thanks.
